name: Cotton Candy Wall
description:
You are a worker who has just finished installing some fluffy-looking fiberglass insulation inside the walls of a building. But before you can pack up and leave, a horde of hungry kids barges in and mistakes the insulation for cotton candy. Now it’s up to you to stop them from eating the sweet but deadly forbidden snack!

A silly little game made for "Sweet to Sour" Game Jam. Move around with WASD, grab the kids with the left mouse button. Can you save all of them?

Content warnings: death
